channel.title: Looking for a good host
channel.description:
[b][u]Prologue[/u] :[/b] I know that everyone is going to say stuff and flame me such as
"GET A BETTER FUCKING COMPUTER YOU ASSFUCK!"
and frankly I don't care. I do not have the money to get a $2350 computer just to host a damn server so I'm just asking around for someone who might have a fast computer and would like to host a server.
[b][u]Requirements[/u] :[/b] 600Mb+ RAM 200MBs+ Connection Speed Some Intelligence The Ability to keep your computer running 24/7 SOME java knowledge
[b][u]Information[/u] :[/b] You need to make sure how have all of the following, please post a picture of your RAM and Connection speed for me to verify that you have a minimum requirements needed. Thanks for the help if you do decide to help! You will need to have those require ment

item.title: Looking for a good host
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

Bump, sorry jungle you know why I dont want to host.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a good host
item.dc:creator: @jungledude jungledude
item.description:
@jungledude wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch™, post:1, topic:168946”]Omfg I Lol’ed so much when i saw the first by him.

[quote]Requirements :
600Mb+ RAM
200MBs+ Connection Speed
Some Intelligence
The Ability to keep your computer running 24/7
SOME java knowledge[/quote]

Good luck finding someone with 600mb Of ram, which is noone!

Who da fuck has 200mb? JaGex has like what 100mb?

Find a dedicated.

L2 computer before posting.[/quote]

My friend who hosted for 2 days has 2Gigs of RAM (I referred to his computer for the price) Who has 200MB? Well a lot of people. If Jagex had 100mb of connectivity we would lag like hell. I know how to compute more then half the fucking community on these boards. I’ve been here for close to two years and what you think I learned nothing. No I learned a lot. So fuck you and gtfo my topic bitch!

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a good host
item.dc:creator: @jungledude jungledude
item.description:
@jungledude wrote:

[quote=“Projeckt Revolution, post:2, topic:168941”]I Love Your “Prolouge”… You Should Make A Book :o

But Seriously… No1 Will Actually Run A Server 24/7… For Free.
Thats Why People Pay For Dedicated Hosts, Pay Their Bills Off Donations… :rolleyes:[/quote]

I’m sorry, I cannot afford $60 a month either. Thanks for the help though

[quote=“trivenge9, post:3, topic:168941”]Hey, go to www.nuclearfallout.net there just pm the webmaster and ask for Mikey k. thats me, i will set up a private gameserver for you for as little as 14.95! a month!

this is not an advertisement…just sumthing i am willing to do for anyone taht doesnt want there source to be stolen by idiots and who want there servers located on an exclusive nfo server of their own![/quote]

If i could I would that would be a steal but I can’t I’m seriously BROKE I’m only earning money from adverts on my site…

Read full topic
